channel.title: So what easter eggs were there in HL1?
channel.description: I went by the FAQ in the wiki to see if it differed from the forum FAQ. The thing about easter eggs made me wonder... what easter eggs where there in half-life 1? I can't recall any.

item.title: So what easter eggs were there in HL1?
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
Have everyone forgot about this easteregg?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fb69i62lWSM&feature=related
The hidden door, everyone, the hidden door… :freeman:

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were there in HL1?

item.description:
that’s kinda sad here i was playing half life - episode thinking that gordon had a daughter to fight for…

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were there in HL1?

item.title: So what easter eggs were there in HL1?
item.dc:creator: eateroftheflame
item.description:
billiam:

what about gordon’s daughter
there is a pic of her in his locker?!?!?!?!?!?

It’s not his daughter, there was a letter in one of the old instruction manuals that mentioned he had no “dependents” it was most likely a relative of one of the the developers put in there as an easter egg. In universe it was probably a more distant relative (a cousin perhaps).

Read full topic

in oppossing force appears another of those chumtoads right before enter in the teleporter chamber were gordon (Die freemen! Dunno if ya remember those sprays the soldiers wrote around black mesa…) has to jump… I don’t know how to explain it in english so look this video from youtube to see it:

item.title: So what easter eggs were there in HL1?
item.dc:creator: HL-guy
item.description:
In the chapter Surface Tension,there is a easter egg(and more of course). When you are at the cliffside,you will find a hgrunt having a huge rock on his back that killed him but his body is still there and not gibbed yet. (I guess that many already know this one though :|)

Read full topic
